name: Battlewasp Wind
text: Twice per turn, if a "Battlewasp" monster(s) is Normal or Special Summoned to your field (except during the Damage Step): You can target 1 of them; add 1 "Battlewasp" monster with less ATK than that monster from your Deck to your hand. Once per turn: You can target 1 Insect monster you control with a Level; this turn, you can treat it as a Tuner if used as Synchro Material. You can only activate 1 "Battlewasp Wind" per turn.
